name: The Quest For The Perfect Coffee
name_original: The Quest For The Perfect Coffee
description:
This Was Made For The Coffee Game Jam 2022 With The Second Theme Being 'Sweet' And So I Interpreted As The Health Is Sugar And It Slowly Decreases So You Need To Harvest Sugar From Enemies To regain Health As You Try To Get To The Perfect Coffee. :D

Also I'm Only 14 And This Is My Fist Game Jam So Don't Judge Me To Harshly
